coreObjective: **AI Guided SaaS** - A hybrid AI-powered platform combining Lovable.dev's intuitive UI/UX with VS Code's power and Claude Code's intelligence.
userGoals: Enable non-technical users to build AI-powered applications
Provide both guided (Lovable.dev style) and advanced (VS Code style) interfaces
Integrate multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic) with fallback
Support rapid prototyping with mock data
